title: Create Homepage Layout
description: Design and structure the homepage layout with essential sections including hero banner, services overview, and call-to-action.

title: Develop Authentication Flow
description: Implement the login and signup functionality with validation and error handling. Connect to backend API for user authentication.

title: Build Product Card Component
description: Create a reusable component for displaying product details including image, title, price, and an 'Add to Cart' button.

title: Setup State Management
description: Integrate state management library (Redux or Context API) to handle global application state for user data, settings, and more.

title: Create Contact Form
description: Design a contact form with fields for name, email, and message. Validate inputs and handle form submissions.

title: Optimize Page Load Speed
description: Analyze the page loading time and implement optimizations, such as lazy loading images and code splitting, to improve performance.

title: Add Search Functionality
description: Implement a search bar with real-time filtering and auto-complete suggestions to help users quickly find content.

title: Implement Dark Mode Toggle
description: Add a toggle switch to enable dark mode. Ensure consistent styles across all components in both light and dark themes.

title: Setup Error Logging
description: Configure error logging to capture and report errors to a monitoring service, enabling easier debugging and issue tracking.

title: Test and Debug UI Components
description: Conduct thorough testing of each UI component to ensure functionality, accessibility, and responsiveness across devices.
